II.ii.2.C.4.a
.
General Folder Renovation Policy
Renovate a paper claims folder as needed to protect the contents.
Perform any required renovation
before
transferring a paper claims folder out of the RACC.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Locked Files Folder Maintenance
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
